for_sales.sales_text:
This is a beautiful boat and sails like a dream. The fibreglass hull was made from a mould derived from an original clinker-built dinghy dating back to about 1955. It has been fitted out with wooden trim by master shipwright Alan Williams at St Osyth.
Length (not including bowsprit): about 12" Beam: about 5".

This is a standing lug rig, which means that neither the boom nor the gaff are rigidly fixed to the mast, but are lashed in place. I will give instructions on how to rig the boat if needed. Tan mainsail and foresail by Jimmy Laurence at Brightlingsea. Built-in buoyancy tanks fore and aft, plus foam buoyancy under the seats.

The sale includes a road trailer with lighting assembly (bring your own number plate – or delivery can be arranged), plus odds and ends such as cover, anchor, bailing bucket, paddle and rowlocks. "TAJ" has recently had some small repairs and a coat of paint.

Selling for health reasons.
for_sales.summary: "TAJ" is a recent copy, GRP, of a classic smack"s dinghy and may be seen ashore at St Osyth, Essex. Selling for health reasons.

boat.full_description:
'TAJ' is a recent copy of the classic East Coast smack's boat. The mould for her fibreglass hull was taken from a clinker-built boat dating from around 1955. She was built in 2005 and fitted out with wooden trim by master shipwright, Alan Williams at St Osyth.

Her tan sails were made by James Lawrence of Brightlingsea, she has a standing lug rig.

When offered for sale in 2016, her owner describes her as 'a beautiful boat, sails like a dream'.
boat.name: TAJ
boat.short_description: Built in 2005, 'TAJ' has a fibreglass hull made from a mould derived from an original clinker-built dinghy, dating back to about 1955.
